markdownRemark.html: One of two children's schools - "La Latina Baby School", located on the Marbella ring road and "Patatina Banus Baby School" located on the famous "golden mile" between Marbella and Puerto Banus. The schools have a fun children's design, with spacious and bright classes, large outdoor areas where children play freely and exercise their fine motor skills. Best bilingual nursery school in Marbella. Great location. beautiful facilities. 2000 square meters of garden. Easy parking, and fantastic qualified staff.

frontmatter.title: Patatina Banus Baby School
